description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7jgo","text":"This protocol purifies DNA from an enzymatic reaction (like a PCR or a digestion with a restriction enzyme.) It is NOT an miniprep -- if you are trying to purify DNA from a culture of E. coli, you are in the wrong place!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8l4p2","text":"Make sure you are using the \"Monarch PCR \u0026 DNA Cleanup Kit\", not the Monarch Plasmid Miniprep Kit. They come in identical boxes -- read the label!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":61}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7vf1u","text":"Mix the ENTIRE DNA sample with 5 times its volume of Binding Buffer. Pipette up and down several times to mix the sample thoroughly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4f2p2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fu6f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"687qq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":15},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":40}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"33mqo","text":"Ie, if you had   of sample, mix it with   of binding buffer.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"696c7","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"A9565F4019AD11ED9DE32F57760F1E66","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"},"1":{"data":{"amount":"1000","error":false,"guid":"AAFCE35019AD11ED9DE32F57760F1E66","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"57t5f","text":"Insert the column into the collection tube and load the sample onto the column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2443o","text":"Centrifuge  . title: DNA Purification (NEB)
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"5aude","text":"The binding buffer may cause irritation to skin and eyes. Additionally, we are shedding nucleases -- enzymes that degrade DNA -- all the time. Wear lab coats, gloves and safety glasses.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24dp8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b35ul","text":"The flow-through (containing the binding buffer or wash buffer) cannot go down the drain. Dispose of it as chemical waste, per the directions of your instructor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
